Record.ClassificationPath: Findings_and_Disorders_Kind/Disease, Disorder or Finding/Finding/Other Finding/Symptom/Genitourinary Signs and Symptoms/Enuresis
Mental Disorders/Mental Disorders Diagnosed in Childhood/Elimination Disorders/Enuresis
Female Urogenital Diseases and Pregnancy Complications/Female Urogenital Diseases/Urologic Diseases/Urination Disorders/Enuresis
Record.BroaderTerm: Female Urogenital Diseases and Pregnancy Complications
Record.Description: Involuntary discharge of URINE after expected age of completed development of urinary control. This can happen during the daytime (DIURNAL ENURESIS) while one is awake or during sleep (NOCTURNAL ENURESIS). Enuresis can be in children or in adults (as persistent primary enuresis and secondary adult-onset enuresis).
